item.title: Genesis - Invisible Touch
item.description:
KY: 60767

Well I’ve been
waiting waiting
Here so long
But thinking nothing
Nothing could go
wrong But now I know
She has a built
in ability
To take
everything she sees
And now it seems
I’m falling

She seems to have an
Invisible
touch yeah
She reaches

Invisible touch yeah
